import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Menu, Segment, Container, Icon, Header, Grid, Input, Button, Sticky, Rail, Sidebar } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import { Link, Router } from '../routes'; class HeaderMobile extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state ={value:''} this.handleChange = this.handleChange.bind(this); this.keyPress = this.keyPress.bind(this); } handleChange(e) { this.setState({ value: e.target.value }); } keyPress(e){ if(e.keyCode == 13){ if (this.state.value!='') Router.pushRoute(`/${'search/'+encodeURIComponent(this.state.value)}`); } } renderUserSideBar() { const { handleSidebarHide, handleToggle, sidebarOpened, children } = this.props; return (

Question Answering System

Question Answering System

 Home About Profile Create Question Feedback Admin Options Block-Chain Based Question Answering System } placeholder='Search...' size='mini' /> {children} ); } render() { return( {this.props.accountType == "Admin"? this.renderAdminSideBar() : this.renderUserSideBar()} ); } } export default HeaderMobile;
